com.shc.ahttp.client.messageconverter

Interface MessageConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JacksonMessageConverter

    public interface MessageConverter
    The message converter interface defines the contract for serializing and deserializing objects to and from a message passed.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    vishalk2
